description:
http://paste.openstack.org/show/18165/

If there is still exists data in fixed_ips and floating_ips after floating ip dissociated and released floating ip list request will failed with exception in paste above.

Seems we have additional bug in floating ip release or dissociate function or in instance terminate or fixed ip dissociate.
title: Request to os-floating-ips failed when instance termination was not clear

comments.content:
http://paste.openstack.org/show/18165/

If there is still exists data in fixed_ips and floating_ips after floating ip dissociated and released floating ip list request will failed with exception in paste above.

Seems we have additional bug in floating ip release or dissociate function or in instance terminate or fixed ip dissociate.
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~ilyaalekseyev

comments.content: Any chance you could reproduce the issue on current Folsom ? Since you don't appear to work on it, I unassigned you, please feel free to pick it back up.
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~ttx

comments.content: We cannot solve the issue you reported without more information. Could you please provide the requested information ?
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~ttx

comments.content: This bug lacks the necessary information to effectively reproduce and fix it, therefore it has been closed. Feel free to reopen the bug by providing the requested information and set the bug status back to ''New''.
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~dims-v
